parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.98</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all layers that have currently active title effect. Numbers equal to or greater than 0 represent cut layers, where as -1 represents title layer (see [[Title Effect Type]]). Named layers are represented by their respective index.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Effects created with [[titleText]], [[titleRsc]] and [[titleObj]] commands do not have a numbered layer, so they are represented as -1 layer in the result. Effects created with [[cutText]], [[cutRsc]] and [[cutObj]] are created either on layer 0, if no layer is specified, or on the given layer, if the layer index is specified, so they are represented by the layer index.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[allActiveTitleEffects]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Number]]s, where each number represents index of currently active effect layer. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[cutText]] ["Hello World!" ,"PLAIN", 2];
[[hint]] [[str]] [[allActiveTitleEffects]]; // [0]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>21 [[cutText]] ["Hello World!", "PLAIN", 2];
[[hint]] [[str]] [[allActiveTitleEffects]]; // [21]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[cutText]] ["Hello World!", "PLAIN", 2];
[[titleText]] ["Hello World!", "PLAIN", 2];
[[hint]] [[str]] [[allActiveTitleEffects]]; // [-1, 0]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allCutLayers]], [[cutText]], [[cutRsc]], [[cutObj]], [[cutFadeOut]], [[titleText]], [[titleRsc]], [[titleObj]], [[titleFadeOut]], [[Title Effect Type]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
